tool_description: Validates job posting content against company brand guidelines to ensure consistent messaging, tone, and presentation across all postings.

job_content.description: Complete job posting content to validate

brand_tone.description: Expected brand tone: professional, casual, friendly, innovative, or authoritative

company_values.description: List of key company values to check for alignment

prohibited_terms.description: Terms that should not appear in job postings

error_messages: Invalid brand tone: Use one of [professional, casual, friendly, innovative, authoritative]
Insufficient company values: Provide at least 2 company values for validation
Content too short: Job content must be at least 100 characters for meaningful validation
Prohibited terms detected: Content contains terms that violate brand guidelines
Missing required disclaimers: One or more required disclaimers are missing from the content
usage: Provide job content, brand tone, and company values. Optionally specify prohibited terms and required disclaimers. The tool analyzes content for brand consistency and provides validation results with recommendations.

tone_alignment.description: Assessment of tone alignment: excellent, good, fair, or poor

values_reflected.description: Number of company values reflected in the content

violations_found.description: List of brand guideline violations detected

improvement_suggestions.description: Specific suggestions to improve brand alignment

approval_status.description: Brand approval status: approved, needs_revision, or rejected
